ygData.subject: Re: Recruiting the Tripredacus crew
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Yup, Naga s a guy. By the way, is SS still a black dragon? Tyrael: I approve. He knows me, so it is likely he will take the offer easily, but I think it

OOC: Yup, Naga's a guy. By the way, is SS still a black dragon?

Tyrael: I approve. He knows me, so it is likely he will take the offer 
easily, but I think it will be better if you come with me. After all, 
you will be his officer, and you should know your men.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Thinking again:  Then I wonder what you'd do if you could see how 
> wicked my spark is.
> 
> Shadow Star:  the let us get this Naga and see if he has any 
> suggestions for our crew (it's a he right?).
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael was pleased. Shadow Star's records showed him to be a 
worthy 
> > junior officer.
> > 
> > Tyrael: As soon as our crew is complete, we will depart. I have 
had 
> no 
> > one in mind except you and Naga, a warrior alongside whom I have 
> > fought. We may need two more members. As for the goal of the 
> > mission... I am sure you have heard of Megatron's latest escapade? 
> Our 
> >  mission is to get him... and slay him. He jeopardizes the 
> Tripredacus 
> > Council's influence on the Predacons. I am ready to take any means 
> > necessary to destroy his wicked spark!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > Shadow Star:  Of course.  I would gladly oblige.
> > > 
> > > Shadow Star thinking but not talking outloud:  FOOL DO YOU NOT 
> > > REALIZE THAT MY ONLY SUPERIOR IN THIS UNIVERSE IS THE INFERNO 
> WHICH 
> > I 
> > > SERVE!  SOON YOU WILL EITHER DIE, OR BOW DOWN TO BOTH ME AND IT!
> > > 
> > > Shadow Star:  So when do we leave?  And who else have you 
chosen.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: Sorry for not posting lately!
> > > > 
> > > > Tyrael looked at the defying robot. Of course, this was a 
> quality 
> > > he 
> > > > looked forward to exploit. He would make a great leader... 
> after 
> > > him. 
> > > > The only important thing was to be sure to have the black one 
> on 
> > > his 
> > > > side.
> > > > 
> > > > Tyrael: I am glad to see you too, Shadow Star. I am here to 
> give 
> > > you a 
> > > > command. As you might know, I have been given Gorefeast's 
> > position. 
> > > As 
> > > > such, I am about to embark on a mission, and the council has 
> given 
> > > me 
> > > > free choice of my crew. I want you as my second in command. Do 
> you 
> > > > agree?
> > > >

> bow.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Shadow Star: What do my (almost joking with the word) 
> superiors 
> > > > > desire of me?
> > > > >

> wrote:

The

reason's
